title: Truly awesome person
description: I am lucky to have Francesco as a part of my circle of friends. He is an exceptional community builder, Docker Captain, DevReal, and YouTuber. He consistently shares his knowledge and enthusiasm with others and is always willing to help. It has been great to see his personal growth and development over time. On top of all that, Francesco is always friendly and approachable, making it a pleasure to know him as a friend.
